name: One Minute Counselor
description: One Minute Counselor is a game made for the 2022 LTU Game Jam. You take the role of The Counselor, and it is your job to give advice to couples who are seeking a potential divorce. Unfortunately for them, you can be fairly... manipulative. Use the powers of Anger, Fear and Sorrow to assist the couples (or not) and discover 27 unique endings! Will you rekindle their relationship, or watch it crash and burn?
